title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, the ultimate portable speaker with microphone that delivers deep, clear, and immersive audio. This sleek and stylish speaker comes in a sleek black color, making it a perfect addition to any setting.

Featuring advanced technologies like PositionIQ technology and a custom-engineered transducer, this speaker ensures exceptional audio quality. Whether you're indoors or outdoors, this speaker is built to withstand any environment with its IP67 waterproof rating. It even floats on water, making it perfect for poolside use.

Not only is this speaker waterproof, but it is also dust-resistant, shock-resistant, corrosion-resistant, and UV light-resistant. Its durable construction ensures that it can handle any adventure you take it on.

The Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is powered by a long-lasting lithium-ion battery, providing up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge. Charging is quick and convenient with the included USB-C cable, taking approximately 4 hours to fully charge.

With its built-in microphone, you can easily take calls or interact with virtual assistants like Siri and Google Assistant. The speaker is also compatible with the Bose Connect App, giving you access to additional features and customizable settings.

Portability is a key feature of this speaker, thanks to its compact design and utility loop for easy carrying. It has a connection range of up to 30 feet, allowing you to enjoy your music wirelessly without being tied down.

The Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is suitable for various use cases, including travel, outdoor activities, and pool use. Its impressive sound quality, durability, and portability make it the perfect companion for all your audio needs.

Upgrade your audio experience with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker today!

Experience superior sound quality and convenience with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. With its portable design, waterproof features, and long battery life, it is perfect for travel, outdoor activities, and pool use. Stay connected with voice assistant access, app support, and customizable settings. Get ready to elevate your audio experience with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker.

Whether you're traveling, enjoying outdoor activities, or relaxing by the pool, the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is the perfect companion. Don't miss out on this exceptional audio experience.
